meanings.definition: Imitative of a style, fashion, or design from the past.
meanings.sent1: The retro dress she wore looked like it came from another time.
meanings.sent2: Her room was decorated in a retro style with old-fashioned furniture.
meanings.sent3: He tried to be retro by wearing bell-bottom pants, but it just looked funny.
meanings.sent4: The retro car gleamed under the sunlight, taking us back in time.
meanings.sent5: The retro music playing in the cafe created a nostalgic atmosphere.

meanings.sent1: She walked retro down the street, looking over her shoulder.
meanings.sent2: The car moved retro along the one-way street.
meanings.sent3: He danced retro at the party, causing everyone to laugh.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to move retro as he watched the clock tick backwards.
meanings.sent5: The film played retro, revealing the story in a unique way.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is retrograde.
meanings.sent1: The retro in the group always resisted new ideas.
meanings.sent2: She considered herself a retro, preferring traditional methods.
meanings.sent3: The retro of the team always brought up old arguments.
meanings.sent4: He was known as the retro of the family, holding onto outdated beliefs.
meanings.sent5: The old clock was a retro, refusing to keep accurate time.
